channel.title: Bard(Blue Dragon Support) and Minstrel(Black Rose Offensive)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: Ballad - Sing a song about target player's heroic deed, their vote now secretly counts as two for the day - 3 uses
Night Ability 1: Serenade - Sing a sweet song to a player, preventing them from being targeted by anything besides Killing Actions - 2 uses
Night Ability 2: Write Song - Gain an extra use of Serenade
Passive: Undeterred - Immune to Occupation
IF CONVERTED BECOMES MINSTREL
Day Ability 1: Put Down - Sing a song about how target player is a coward and a liar, their vote now secretly counts as zero for the day - 3 uses
Night Ability 1: Annoy - Sing a terrible song at a player's house, preventing all Blue Dragon abilities from affecting them - 2 uses
Night Ability 2: Write Song - Gain an extra use of Annoy
Passive: Undeterred - Immune to Occupation
Lore: He plays music I guess
Comments: IDK
